attributes.action: Continue the London 2012 Olympics tradition of gold postboxes for gold medalists
attributes.background: In London 2012 gold medalists had gold postboxes in recognition of sporting success and to encourage others. I propose that all gold medalist from the Rio and all subsequent Olympics and paralympics receive the same as a constant reminder that 'if you can dream, you can do it'.

rejection.details:
The Royal Mail postbox network is the responsibility of Royal Mail PLC, and not the UK Government.

If you wished to take the matter up with Royal Mail, the company can be contacted here:  https://personal.help.royalmail.com/app/contact
